=======
CHANGES
=======

1.1.0 (1008-05-05)
------------------

- Use FCKeditor 2.6

- Use versioned directories for javascript to cache-bust


1.0.1 (2007-11-02)
------------------

- Package data update.

- Updated code to work with packages in Zope 3.4 release.


1.0.0 (2007-10-29)
------------------

- Initial release.
